headline: BRUNSON INSTRUMENT ALIGNMENT TELESCOPE
description: Alignment Telescope      Tripod in photo is representative; actual tripod has yellow legs and grey top
categories.lvl2: Inspection Equipment  >  Optical Inspection Equipment > Other Optical Inspection
specstable:
Manufacturer Brunson Instrument
Model 81
Description Alignment Telescope
Accessories Mounting Base, Tripod and Light source
Other Information Telescope:
Length: 14 Inches
Magnification: 20X at 2 Inches,30X at Infinity
Field of View: 1 Deg.
Image: Erect
Optics: Low Reflective,Protecive Coating
Effective Aperture: 1.34 Inches
Resolution: 3.9 Arcseconds
Retical: Glass,Filar/Bi-Filar Pattern
Focusing Range: 2 Inches to Infinity
Exterior Dimensions
Width 2.750 in (7.0 cm)
Height 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
